```{r}
library("ggplot2")
library("dplyr")
library("tidyr")
library(viridis)
require(cowplot)
require(forcats)
library(ggsignif)
```

```{r}
# read in master data frame
induce_exp <- read.table("~/Desktop/InducibleArchitectures/processed_data/induce_exp(updated).txt", header = T)

# split reg elements apart
induce_combo <- subset(induce_exp, grepl("COMBO", induce_exp$name)) %>% separate(col = 'name', into = c("Library", "Distal", "Min_35", "Min_10", "Proximal"), sep = "-", remove = F)
```

```{r}
# Figure 2B: Big tile plot of fold-change
induce_combo$Min_10  <- with(induce_combo, reorder(Min_10, normalized_RNA_exp_Induced_12, median))
induce_combo$Min_35 <- with(induce_combo, reorder(Min_35, -normalized_RNA_exp_Induced_12, median))

ggplot(induce_combo, aes(x = Proximal, y = Distal)) + 
  geom_tile(aes(fill = log2(ratio)), alpha = 1, size = 0.5, color = 'gray20') + 
  scale_x_discrete(limits = c("lacOscram", "O3_leftSym", "lacO2", "O3_rightSym", "O1_rightSym", "O2_leftSym", "lacO3", "O2_rightSym", "lacO1", "lacOsym")) + 
  scale_y_discrete(limits = c("lacOscram", "O3_leftSym", "lacO2", "O3_rightSym", "O1_rightSym", "O2_leftSym", "lacO3", "O2_rightSym", "lacO1", "lacOsym")) + 
  scale_fill_viridis(limits = c(-2.2, 3.17)) +
  facet_grid(Min_35 ~ Min_10) +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "gray40"), 
        axis.ticks = element_blank(), 
        axis.text.y = element_blank(), 
        axis.text.x = element_blank(), 
        strip.text = element_blank(),
        panel.spacing = unit(0.10, "lines"))
ggsave('~/Desktop/InducibleArchitectures/Figure2/Figure2B.pdf', height = 11, width = 13)
```


```{r}
# Figure 2C: Tile plot of Distal x Proximal for consensus promoter, fill is Fold Change. 
ggplot(filter(induce_combo, Min_10 == 'minus10cons', Min_35 == 'minus35cons'), aes(x = Proximal, y = Distal)) + geom_tile(aes(fill = log2(ratio)), color = 'black', alpha = 0.9, size = 0.25) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1, size = 15), axis.text.y = element_text(size = 15)) +
  scale_fill_viridis(name = expression('log'[2]~'(Fold-change)'), limits = c(-2.2, 3.17)) +
  labs(x = 'Proximal', y = 'Distal', size = 20) +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "gray40")) +
  theme(axis.text=element_text(size=14), axis.title=element_text(size = 14)) +
  scale_x_discrete(limits = c("lacOscram", "O3_leftSym", "lacO2", "O3_rightSym", "O1_rightSym", "O2_leftSym", "lacO3", "O2_rightSym", "lacO1", "lacOsym")) + 
  scale_y_discrete(limits = c("lacOscram", "O3_leftSym", "lacO2", "O3_rightSym", "O1_rightSym", "O2_leftSym", "lacO3", "O2_rightSym", "lacO1", "lacOsym")) + 
  theme(axis.text = element_text(size = 20),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 20),
        title = element_text(size = 24),
        legend.text = element_text(size = 15))
ggsave('~/Desktop/InducibleArchitectures/Figure2/Figure2C.pdf', width = 10.5, height = 7)
```

```{r}
# Figure 2F: -35 x -10 tile plot for promoters with proximal Osym or O1. Uninduced Expression plotted.
induce_combo$Min_10  <- with(induce_combo, reorder(Min_10, normalized_RNA_exp_Induced_12, median))
induce_combo$Min_35 <- with(induce_combo, reorder(Min_35, normalized_RNA_exp_Induced_12, median))

induce_combo %>% 
  filter(Proximal == 'lacOsym' | Proximal == 'lacO1') %>%
  group_by(Min_10, Min_35) %>%
  mutate(combo_ratio=mean(normalized_RNA_exp_UnInduced_12)) %>%
  dplyr::select(Min_10, Min_35, combo_ratio) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Min_10, y = Min_35)) +  geom_tile(aes(fill = combo_ratio), alpha = 0.9, color = 'black', size = 0.3) +  
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1, size = 15), axis.text.y = element_text(size = 15)) +
  scale_fill_viridis(name = expression('Uninduced Expression')) +
  labs(x = 'Minus 10', y = 'Minus 35', size = 30) +
   theme(axis.text = element_text(size = 20),
         axis.title = element_text(size = 20),
         title = element_text(size = 24),
         legend.text = element_text(size = 15)) +
  geom_text(aes(label=signif(combo_ratio, 3)), size=5) + 
  scale_y_discrete(limits = c('minus35_30C_33T', 'minus35_33T', 'minus35_31A_32C', 'minus35cons')) +
  scale_x_discrete(limits = c('minus10_7A', 'minus10_12A', 'minus10_12G', 'minus10cons'))
ggsave('~/Desktop/InducibleArchitectures/Figure2/Figure2F.pdf', width = 11.5, height = 7)
```
